name: Assault ChaingunS KM
overview: On-rails arcade shooter Assault ChaingunS KM was released to the Nintendo Switch on February 20, 2020 in Japan. It originally released on iOS and Android in 2018. The game harkens back to the early 3D era of on-rails shooters with players taking control of chainguns from an attack helicopter, just as the city has become invaded by a mysterious robot force and the player is sent in to clean up! Up to four players can play together using the Joy-Con, adding in gyro controls to help aiming easier. Additionally, there are two new stages exclusive to the Switch version.
